website_summaries.verdict: A strong dose of vitamin E for a good price.
pros: Each soft gel contains 1,000 IU of vitamin E. Rapid release liquid soft gels are easy to swallow
cons: Not vegetarian-friendly since they contain gelatin

customer_reviews.title: Artificial Vitamin E Source
customer_reviews.text: My bad when looking for a Vitamin E supplement. dl-alpha-tocopherol, as in this product, is the synthetic form while d-alpha-tocopherol is naturally sourced. The natural form is slightly more biologically active. Studies show d-alpha-tocopherol is utilized by the body up to 3x more than dl-alpha-tocopherol. If you're going to take a supplement you might as well make it count.
customer_reviews.author: TerryM

customer_reviews.title: From soybean oil (most likely GMO to boot)
customer_reviews.text: My bad. I Failed to read the label. I assumed it would be from wheat germ oil but instead it is from soybean oil, and since it doesn't say non-GMO, in the case of soybeans that means a very high likelihood from Monsanto GMO soybeans which would be sprayed with glyphosate (the whole reason for genetic modification is to be Roundup herbicide resistant). I bought 3 bottles of rancid flax oil directly from Puritan's Pride in the past, so I suppose I shouldn't have been surprised that the item is not eligible for return. I'll keep it at my workbench and see how it does for lubricating things.
customer_reviews.author: reluctant consumer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with breast pain!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for breast pain. I have fibrocystic breast tissue which is very painful. I have been told by various doctors over the years that this helps breast pain. It works for me. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CINDI

customer_reviews.title: Enormous pill.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea of the effectiveness, but these pills are ENORMOUS. They are by far the largest vitamin or capsule I've ever had to swallow. They go down easily, but I think they should provide a picture of the actual pill so you aren't surprised when you get them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine from Philly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Send me horrible product! All capsules melted and mixed together. I can’t separate even one of them. Waste my money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The product is rancid and you can't return it! I just opened my pills and it smells fishy! I went to try to return it and I can't! I wished I read the reviews before purchasing. Please don't make the same mistake like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Puchipoo

customer_reviews.title: Probably good
customer_reviews.text: You know its a vitamin. I like vitamin E, its cool, probably does the health stuff its supposed to do. But how do I really know? I'm not taking it to a lab for statistical analysis or anything. Its essentially impossible to say that if I am feeling radiating positivity its directly linked to a vitamin E supplement. Still, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kostreba

customer_reviews.title: Good soft gel with higher dose of vitamin E.
customer_reviews.text: Great higher dose of vitamin E. Soft gels had been stored properly (they weren't stuck together, which happens if not kept correctly!), dated ahead. This was my second order of these vitamin E, and probably won't be my last! Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Roget

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins came all stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many Vitamin E vitamins over the years, but this is the first time I have ever received a bottle of Vitamin E that was completely stuck in the bottle. Apparently, this bottle of vitamin E was in a very hot area at some time causing them to melt somewhat. I did not send them back to Amazon, however, it took me quite a while to get them out of the bottle and unstuck causing some leakage of the vitamins. I am just hoping they have enough oil left in them to be worthwhile. I don't know if I will buy any jell type vitamins from Amazon again, since this was a very disappointing experience!
customer_reviews.author: Redtag

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS PRODUCT - DO NOT USE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamin E gel caps are SO HUGE they actually should be labeled as a hazard. This is the only time I have ever thrown away a full bottle of vitamins but the cost wasn't worth sending them back. Having worked in the medical field more than 30 years, I have NEVER seen an OTC product I would consider dangerous, but this one is just that! This is an absolute DO NOT PURCHASE!! A very dangerous and ridiculous product!! Of all my prior reviews, I have never had one as frightening as this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a "hair strengthening serum" recipe I saw on YouTube. After making it twice, I realized this wasn't something I was going to do regularly so I took them as a supplement daily. They were big, but not hard to down with some liquid and seemed fresh. I won't be repurchasing, but not because the product was bad in any way, I just don't think I need a vitamin E supplement regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Genedoll

customer_reviews.title: Much needed pills (for me!) at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I stocked up on these so I will be set for awhile and I plan on coming back for more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Raider

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the bottle I could tell they were rancid. There was no expiration date which I also thought was weird.
customer_reviews.author: JustJess677

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the Soft Gels are kinda big.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft gels and the capsules are pure (can be determined from how clear they are). Only problem is that they are kinda big. Doesnt bother me much though, because I dont mind taking pills and it helps that they dont taste bad and they're easy to swallow. But if you dont like taking pills and you're looking to buy Vitamin E soft gels, dont buy these because of their size.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Late and appears tampered with!
customer_reviews.text: The product was over a week late, and when I finally got it today, the tamper seal on the lid was unattached, the lid itself was broken to the point that it won't even screw bank onto the bottle. I needed this for surgical recovery and ended up going to Walmart to purchase a similar product for the same price, because it was so late. Super unimpressed. Pick a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Shove

customer_reviews.title: Great little whisk but it doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Nice and powerful, I like to whisk my half and half and "top off" my morning coffee. It works fine for awhile and then gives out. I think problem with the push button mechanism that just gives out? I've just finished with my 3rd one going out on me so will be trying another one. Sorry PowerLix but I gave you 3 chances over the course of a year or more, and 3 strikes and you are out.
customer_reviews.author: Noodle's mom

customer_reviews.title: May Have A Shipping or Prior Storage Issue
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this a 5 but this is second bottle that has arrived with all the gel capsules stuck together in a blob as if they had been in an extreme temperature. After constant shaking a few at a time come loose so you can salvage the bottle but you shouldn't have to do this. If not for that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Its hard to find high doses like this but they are worth taking
customer_reviews.text: this makes a big impact on my skin and hair. Its hard to find high doses like this but they are worth taking.
customer_reviews.author: Pari

customer_reviews.title: Melted together, shipping?
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten before, this time gel tabs were stuck together almost kinda melted together. Probably not a manufacturer defect but a shipping defect from sitting in an area too hot for too long
customer_reviews.author: jason a

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time like usual with Amazon. I did not open the bottle right away because I had some vitamin e left. When I did open the bottle I discovered that one of the capsules was leaking and the entire contents are one big blob. Almost impossible to separate.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: No strong flavor, which is great. I also like that I can use the gel on skin issues or use it for cosmetic purposes and it works well for that. The only issue I have is with the size of the pill- it’s quite massive. It’s not hard to swallow bc it’s a gel cap, but it’s literally a horse pill so it hurts a little going down sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Sticky situation
customer_reviews.text: I had Bought the product before no problem. This time 50% of the pills were melted together and when I tried to separate them they opened up leaving my hands with vitamin oil that required dishwashing liquid to take off , but I was happily surprised when Amazon replaces it with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Herrera

customer_reviews.title: They are all clumped together. Smashed, vitamin E oil coming out. Hard to ory apart.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like receiving vitamins stuck together, hard to pry apart with vitamin E oil coming out. I needed these for my liver.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Marks

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin E
customer_reviews.text: Best price for comparable, and trust Puritan's Pride so recommend this VitE

customer_reviews.title: Smell terrible
customer_reviews.text: I opened them and they smell really bad and tasted terrible... I take vitamin E all the time but took this once and felt terrible. The smell was horrific. Would never buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Rancid vitamin E pills
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bottles to take overseas with me. When I opened the bottle I was shocked because it had a rancid smell. Vitamin E has no smell. I can't use them. This is the second time I have had a problem with Puritans pride products. One time I bought Saint John's Wort that has a very distinctive smell when you open the bottle – but in the puritan pride pills there was no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: 1981 - 2009  1000 units d alpha every day
customer_reviews.text: What good all those years of Vitamin E did me I don't know. I'm back on it 2019 - ? @ 69 years I am in good health and my skin is younger looking friends say.
customer_reviews.author: Volatile Image

customer_reviews.title: The sealed cover is so hard to peel
customer_reviews.text: The sealed cover on the bottle was so hard to peel. And eventually when it's finally lifted, the pills were splashed all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: TinTin Q

customer_reviews.title: These are quality supplements. I break one open to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are quality supplements. I break one open to put on scraped knees. The wounds heal very quickly. Kids dont mind at all. Very soothing. Small enough to swallow for an antioxidant boost.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelflame

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I got these to take after I had a small lesion removed to help care for the scar. Best price I could find with the highest pill count.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I chose this vitamin E for a concoction that I made up for a hair treatment.

customer_reviews.title: Melted Blob
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this in the past and it was just fine. This time they are all melted together and I can’t even get the pills out of the bottle it’s one big melted blob.

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product/vitamin alone has kept my skin hydrated while on Accutane (which has severely dehydrated me from within). I appreciate how many capsules came in the container, because I’ve taken once a day for the past two months, and I still have some left. Will be purchasing again just before I run out.

customer_reviews.title: but easy to swallow

Rapid release liquid soft gels are easy to swallow

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
